name: @mateosuarezdev/headers-builder
description: A fluent, type-safe HTTP headers builder for modern JavaScript runtimes.

scripts.build: yarn clean && bun run build.ts && tsc --emitDeclarationOnly && rimraf dist/build.d.ts
scripts.prepublish: yarn clean && yarn typecheck && yarn build
scripts.rel:patch: yarn version patch && yarn npm publish --access public
scripts.rel:minor: yarn version minor && yarn npm publish --access public
scripts.rel:major: yarn version major && yarn npm publish --access public

author: Mateo Suarez <msdevuy@gmail.com>
